We saw this place as we were walking into Parc Guel.  They had some signs up for picnic specials, so we popped in.  They have good selection of sandwiches to take out or eat in.  We grabbed a couple sandwiches and sodas (oh how I miss lemon Fanta!) and head into the park.They are good, solid sandwiches.  They are nothing special; meat and cheese, but they hit the spot and they were reasonably priced.The owner was serving us.  He talked us up a bit and was very friendly.
